oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-03-16 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 16, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performers the Wilburn Brothers (although Benny Martin was advertised as the guest for this week on the previous show), and regular performers Rod Brasfield, the Anita Kerr Singers, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Rod Brasfield; Wilburn Brothers; Anita Kerr Singers; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- I'm Gonna Live Some Before I Die (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces the Wilburn Brothers -- I'm Settin' You Free (Wilburn Brothers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Faron Young) -- Faron Young talks -- Old Joe Clark -- Faron Young talks -- The Shrine Of St. Cecilia (Faron Young, Anita Kerr Singers) -- Faron Young introduces Del Wood -- After Five (Del Wood)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Lavender, Shorty; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Anita Kerr Singers; Young, Faron; Wilburn Brothers; Wilburn, Teddy; Wilburn, Doyle
